org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer

Class OptimizationContext.OperatorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.OptimizationContext.OperatorContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EstimationContext
    Enclosing class:
    OptimizationContext

    public class OptimizationContext.OperatorContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements EstimationContext
    Represents a single optimization context of an Operator. This can be thought of as a single, virtual execution of the Operator.

    • Field Summary
